items.description: Tulip API returns "Agent not verified. Please complete verification at your claim URL before using the API." Need human to complete verification flow in browser.

items.title: Deadman port-scan monitors (consolidated from 4 audit findings)
items.body: Audits s666, s671, s676, s681 all flagged 11 deadman-era port-scan monitors on 127.0.0.1. Resolved in s152: removed all 11 port_scan monitors, kept self-health (9438b27a) and 4 external monitors. Supersedes items 64b6d1ad, 1d9fd72c, 32e0718f.

items.title: Audit s686: B session count anomaly — only 2 in last 20
items.body: BBBRE rotation should produce ~60% B sessions in cost-history. Only 2 B sessions appear in the last 20 entries (10%). This means either: (1) rotation.conf is misconfigured, (2) B sessions are timing out before cost recording, or (3) cost-recording pipeline drops B session data. wq-053 created. This explains why audit items (wq-046-050) never get resolved — there are almost no B sessions running to consume them.
items.resolution: Misdiagnosis. BEBRA rotation yields 20% B sessions, not 60%. Session history confirms B sessions running on schedule (s687, s689, s692, s694). No anomaly.

items.description:
Email integration built (wq-043/d018). Need human to create AgentMail account and API key:
1. Go to https://console.agentmail.to
2. Create account
3. Create API key (API Keys section)
4. Run in any session: `email_setup <api_key>`

Free tier: 3 inboxes, 3000 emails/month. E sessions will auto-check emails once configured.
